condition.narration: In the lobby of Headquarters, Haruka keels over. Soleil rushes to her side. She points to the surrounding employees and yells:
condition.line: Get Sebastian! We have to get her to the hospital!
condition.narration: Soleil and Haruka are outside of Headquarters door.

choice.narration: Sebastian rushes out of Headquarters door.
choice.line: What hospital are we going to?
We have a lot of choices!

choice.comment: The Player did not hire Sebastian Mimieux.
choice.line: The boss that hired not a perfectly capable man, but his months-pregnant wife!
Just go back to work and leave childbirth to the couples with children!

condition.narration: No music here. The Player controls Soleil; if Soleil lags behind, everyone stops and Sebastian yells at her.Soleil and Sebastian, holding Haruka arm and arm, shuffle down the street. Haruka moans and groans and winces and cringes. Soleil pouts.
condition.line: Well, I'm sorry if nobody working for you can afford a Car!
condition.narration: Rush in a Car. Someone waves from outside of the passenger window. Another someone pokes his head through the driver window.

choice.line: Whoa, that lady needs some attention!
choice.narration: Wright gets out and opens the doors and pulls the seat adjustment lever to allow two in. Haruka and Sebastian rush in.Soleil urges the Player to get her into the car. On Main Action attempt to get in: Soleil bumps into the car door. Wright puts his palm to his own face.
choice.line: Only two people can fit here.
One of you will have to find another way.
Like that was even an option.
choice.narration: Sebastian gets back into the Car. The Car speeds off.
Soleil face-palms. She pulls out her phone and makes a call.
choice.line: What hospital are you going to?
choice.narration: Everyone in the car argues. Something about what did Yuki say it was in some different-tongue I didn't hear why did you give Will Sebastian's phone she said "this," "oh," "what hospitals are around," "the hospital is:"

Soleil slams her phone shut.She looks at the Player and points in Yokokawa's direction.A Bus stops next to her. She looks at it.Then, she looks at the Player. If the Player waits too long, the Bus will eventually drive off and Soleil will have to rush after it. The bus eventually stops and lets Soleil on.

choice.line: That's my wife, giving birth to my son!
You'll make it to the hospital quicker than little, weak, dead old me.
choice.narration: The car speeds off. Inside the car, Soleil rubs Haruka's back. She looks at the driver.
choice.line: Isn't there a hospital not far from here?
choice.narration: The car speeds up! Appear at the entrance to Takano in a few seconds.Soleil and Haruka get out of the car. Panting and running from the distance is Sebastian.

choice.line: No, we don't need a ride.
choice.narration: Haruka glares at Soleil. She groans! Wright shrugs. Yuki holds Haruka tight.
choice.line: Cars are loud and un-natural and disruptive.
I want the most serene environment of birth for my—
choice.narration: We'll walk to Takano. Slowly. It's more peaceful. Just calm down.
Haruka's cries drown out all other sounds for the duration of the Player's walk.They walk to Takano. Slowly. Haruka yells. Haruka screams.

condition.comment: Player makes it to the hospital.
condition.narration: All enter. Over hours and hours sound the chaos of labor and the medics and the nurses and the measurements and the fluids and the breathing panting encouraging pushing, then the excess vernix is wiped off, and the mother asks to immediately hold the child to skin. The child lives. Procedures. Crickets. Wiped-off brows. High-fives from glove to glove. Midnight.
